extension.name: YJ Image Slider V4
extension.author: Youjoomla.com
extension.description:
YJ Image Slider v4



Images can be in any ROOT/images folder but to keep them all in one place
we created ROOT/images/upload_slides folder for you.
Once you click on 'select' button you will be taken to images/upload_slides folder.


YJIS support can be found here

Different Options examples are here

List of available MediaboxAdvanced video types can be found here

For all info on MediaboxAdvanced please visit official website

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module suffix
field.description: Suffix which will be used in description of class of style (CSS) of the module. It allows to use individual style of the module.

field.name: module_template
field.label: Select default module template
field.description:
You can create custom layout templates for this module. Simply click the create new template button below and module engine will copy Default template and name it by the name you have selected in creation process.
You could also copy modules/mod_yjis4/tmpl/default folder , rename it to your own template name and edit default.php within your template folder to your liking.
Once you have created your module template , your template name will be visible here.
For template overrides please copy your module template folder to your template/html/mod_yjis4/ folder and create custom overides for each module instance. Edit Template option can be used to customize the module template files from here.

field.name: swidth
field.label: Slide width (px):
field.description: Slide width (px)

field.name: sheight
field.label: Slide height (px):
field.description: Slide height (px)

field.name: sorient
field.label: Slide orientation
field.description: Slide animation orientation.

field.name: type_slider
field.label: Slide Type
field.description: You can choose from 3 animation effects. Fade , scroll or scrollfade

field.name: start_slide
field.label: Start slide on page load
field.description: If set to yes slider will start animating on page load, otherwise use will have to click on navigations to get to next slide

field.name: stime
field.label: Slide time:
field.description: Pause between the slides in milliseconds

field.name: sduration
field.label: Slide duration:
field.description: Slide transition durration

field.name: smenu
field.label: Show navigation arrows
field.description: Show slide navigation arrows.( left ,right )

field.name: tooltips
field.label: Show slide tool tips
field.description: Show slide tool tip on mousenter on slide image

field.name: order
field.label: Slides ordering
field.description: Slide ordering

field.name: thumb_pagination
field.label: Show Thumbnail navigation
field.description: Conveyor belt with thumbnails and link to each slide

field.name: beltOrientation
field.label: Thumbnail belt orientation
field.description: Conveyor belt thumbs direction , vertical or horizontal

field.name: thumb_width
field.label: Thumbnail width (px):
field.description: Thumbnail width (px). Please note if Thumbnail image is not avaliable , original image will be resized to this width. Image disortion might occur if no thumbnail is used.

field.name: thumb_height
field.label: Thumbnail height (px):
field.description: Thumbnail height (px). Please note if Thumbnail image is not avaliable , original image will be resized to this height. Image disortion might occur if no thumbnail is used.

field.name: visibleItems
field.label: Visible thumbs on belt
field.description:
This is number of visible Thumbnails on conveyor belt. To acheive nice effect follow this example: Use 5 slides , set this param to 3. Only 3 Thumbnails will be visible but you can slide to 5 with nice scroll animation to each Thumbnail.
Note:
Min 2 visble items.

field.name: thumbsOpacity
field.label: Inactive Thumbnail opacity
field.description: Max 1= completely visible. Min 0.1

field.name: beltPosition
field.label: Thumbnail belt position
field.description: Standard CSS rules for position property apply. Use left and right only if belt orientation is vertical, otherwise use top and bottom. Note that belt has 8px top and bottom padding so that Thumbnail top and bottom shadow stays visible. If the belt orientation is vertical , setup the thumbs height and visible first , than nudge the left /right / top position untill the thumbnails fit the belt.

field.name: thumbs_tooltips
field.label: Show Thumbnails tool tips
field.description: Hide or show Thumbnails elements tooltips

field.name: thumb_arrows
field.label: Show Thumbnail navigation arrows
field.description: Show Thumbnail navigation arrows.( left ,right )

field.name: pagination
field.label: Show bottom navigation
field.description: Link to each slide under the slider with slide number

field.name: pagination_counter
field.label: Show pagination counter
field.description: Counter on the left side under the slider. (Link 1 of 2)

field.name: navs_tooltips
field.label: Show navigation tool tips
field.description: Hide or show navigation elements tooltips

field.name: mbox_theme
field.label: MediaboxAdvanced Template
field.description: MediaboxAdvanced comes with 4 templates

field.name: over_opacity
field.label: Overlay opacity
field.description: 1 is opaque, 0 is completely transparent

field.name: loop_image
field.label: Allow media looping
field.description: Allows to navigate between first and last media file. VIdeos and images.

field.name: use_NB
field.label: Use NonverBlaster for media
field.description: Use NonverBlaster (Yes) or JW Media Player (No) for .flv and .mp4 files.

field.default: GLOBAL INTRO TEXT AND DESCRIPTION SETTINGS

field.name: hide_all_intros
field.label: Hide all intro texts
field.description: This setting will hide all slide intro texts displayed on top of the slide image. This setting is useful if you want to display only slide image and Thumbnail navigation.

field.name: hide_all_descriptions
field.label: Hide all descriptions
field.description: This setting will hide all slide descriptions displayed on top of the slide image. This setting is useful if you want to display only slide image and Thumbnail navigation. Note: It will be visible in slide tooltips.

field.name: slide_image_1
field.label: Select slide 1 image
field.description: Select slide 1 image or upload new one. Directory upload_slides is already created. just hit the select button.If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_genthumb_1
field.label: Generate Thumbnail
field.description: You can create or upload slide Thumbnail . Note that created Thumbnail has precedence over uploaded one. If you wish to clear this Thumbnail click on clear button in Select slide param . Click on Create Thumbnail button to generate small image for slide 1

field.name: slide_thumb_1
field.label: Or upload slide 1 Thumbnail
field.description: Select slide 1 thumbnail image. If none is selected the original image will be used.

field.name: slide_title_1
field.label: Slide 1 title
field.description: Slide 1 title. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_description_1
field.label: Slide 1 Description
field.description: Slide 1 description. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_intro_1
field.label: Slide 1 into text
field.description: If using html , use only br and a tag. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: mboxlink_1
field.label: Mbox link for slide 1
field.description:
This needs to be image or video link. To see what types of videos you can use please look to your left under the YJIS Logo for

List of available MediaboxAdvanced video types link.

Or visit http://iaian7.com/webcode/

for all info on MediaboxAdvanced.

The image/video Title and description use slide title and description param.

NOTE: If left blank it will not be used.

If you have Mbox AND Normal link set for this slide

Normal link will take over.

field.name: mboxtype_1
field.label: Mbox link type for slide 1
field.description: Video or image link ?

field.name: video_width_1
field.label: Mbox video width
field.description: Define video width. Effective only if media type is video

field.name: video_height_1
field.label: Mbox video height
field.description: Define video height. Effective only if media type is video

field.name: image_group_1
field.label: Activate media group?
field.description: If this param is set to yes, you can group any of your images links in a mbox image gallery

field.name: image_group_name_1
field.label: Media group name
field.description: NOTE: This group name must be set same for all media types that you would like to show in same group

field.name: slide_link_1
field.label: Slide 1 link
field.description:
If left empty it will not be displayed.If you have Mbox AND Normal link set.

Normal link will take over.

Just make sure you have one or the other set, NOT both.

field.name: slide_open_1
field.label: Open slide 1 link in
field.description: Open link in new window or same page

field.name: slide_genthumb_9
field.label: Generate Thumbnail
field.description: You can create or upload slide Thumbnail . Note that created Thumbnail has precedence over uploaded one. If you wish to clear this Thumbnail click on clear button in Select slide param . Click on Create Thumbnail button to generate small image for slide 9

field.name: slide_thumb_9
field.label: Or upload slide 9 Thumbnail
field.description: Select slide 9 thumbnail image. If none is selected the original image will be used. These will be displayed only if Show Thumbnail navigation is set to yes

field.name: slide_title_9
field.label: Slide 9 title
field.description: Slide 9 title. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_description_9
field.label: Slide 9 Description
field.description: Slide 9 description. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_intro_9
field.label: Slide 9 into text
field.description: If using html , use only br and a tag. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: mboxlink_9
field.label: Mbox link for slide 9
field.description:
This needs to be image or video link. To see what types of videos you can use please look to your left under the YJIS Logo for

List of available MediaboxAdvanced video types link.

Or visit http://iaian7.com/webcode/

for all info on MediaboxAdvanced.

The image/video Title and description use slide title and description param.

NOTE: If left blank it will not be used.

If you have Mbox AND Normal link set for this slide

Normal link will take over.

field.name: mboxtype_9
field.label: Mbox link type for slide 9
field.description: Video or image link ?

field.name: video_width_9
field.label: Mbox video width
field.description: Define video width. Effective only if media type is video

field.name: video_height_9
field.label: Mbox video height
field.description: Define video height. Effective only if media type is video

field.name: image_group_9
field.label: Activate media group?
field.description: If this param is set to yes, you can group any of your images links in a mbox image gallery

field.name: image_group_name_9
field.label: Media group name
field.description: NOTE: This group name must be set same for all media types that you would like to show in same group

field.name: slide_link_9
field.label: Slide 9 link
field.description:
If left empty it will not be displayed. If you have Mbox AND Normal link set.

Normal link will take over.

Just make sure you have one or the other set, NOT both.

field.name: slide_open_9
field.label: Open slide 9 link in
field.description: Open link in new window or same page

field.label: Slide 19 title
field.description: Slide 19 title. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_description_19
field.label: Slide 19 Description
field.description: Slide 19 description. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_intro_19
field.label: Slide 19 into text
field.description: If using html , use only br and a tag. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: mboxlink_19
field.label: Mbox link for slide 19
field.description:
This needs to be image or video link. To see what types of videos you can use please look to your left under the YJIS Logo for

List of available MediaboxAdvanced video types link.

Or visit http://iaian7.com/webcode/

for all info on MediaboxAdvanced.

The image/video Title and description use slide title and description param.

NOTE: If left blank it will not be used.

If you have Mbox AND Normal link set for this slide

Normal link will take over.

field.name: mboxtype_19
field.label: Mbox link type for slide 19
field.description: Video or image link ?

field.name: video_width_19
field.label: Mbox video width
field.description: Define video width. Effective only if media type is video

field.name: video_height_19
field.label: Mbox video height
field.description: Define video height. Effective only if media type is video

field.name: image_group_19
field.label: Activate media group?
field.description: If this param is set to yes, you can group any of your images links in a mbox image gallery

field.name: image_group_name_19
field.label: Media group name
field.description: NOTE: This group name must be set same for all media types that you would like to show in same group

field.name: slide_link_19
field.label: Slide 19 link
field.description:
If left empty it will not be displayed. If you have Mbox AND Normal link set.

Normal link will take over.

Just make sure you have one or the other set, NOT both.

field.name: slide_open_19
field.label: Open slide 19 link in
field.description: Open link in new window or same page

field.name: slide_image_20
field.label: Select slide 20 image
field.description: Select slide 20 image or upload new one. Directory upload_slides is already created. just hit the select button.If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_genthumb_20
field.label: Generate Thumbnail
field.description: You can create or upload slide Thumbnail . Note that created Thumbnail has precedence over uploaded one. If you wish to clear this Thumbnail click on clear button in Select slide param . Click on Create Thumbnail button to generate small image for slide 20

field.name: slide_thumb_20
field.label: Or upload slide 20 Thumbnail
field.description: Select slide 20 thumbnail image. If none is selected the original image will be used. These will be displayed only if Show Thumbnail navigation is set to yes

field.name: slide_title_20
field.label: Slide 20 title
field.description: Slide 20 title. If left empty it will not be displayed

field.name: slide_description_20

field.description: Slide 20 description. If left empty it will not be displayed
